properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " -m" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /m") and ((FolderPath endswith "\\livekd.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\livekd64.exe") or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "livekd.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of LiveKD with the "-m" flag to potentially dump the kernel memory
